caption.p: Details for each animal sampled at Kapiti Plains Ranch 2014–2016 - identification, date of birth, sex, sampling date, breed, samples available, clinical status and test results. Column headings: Brand, animal identification; DOB, date of birth; Sex, M = male, F = female; Sample date, date sample collected; Breed, Boran = Boran breed, Dairy = Boran cross Friesian or Ayrshire; Blood, Yes = blood sample available for testing, No = sample not available; Serum, Yes = serum sample available for testing, No = sample not available; Clinical, Yes = animal presented with clinical WA-MCF, No = animal did not have clinical signs; PCR, Positive = positive test result, Negative = negative in all tests; ELISA, Positive = positive ELISA value, Negative = negative in all tests. (DOCX 43 kb)
